headline.main: BRITISH DISCERN PERIL FOR TURKEY; London Observers Regard the Bulgar Action as Heralding New Nazi Bid for Straits BRITISH DISCERN PERIL FOR TURKEY

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 21 -- Qualified London observers, studying Bulgaria's declaration of a state of emergency issued yesterday, termed it flatly tonight a forerunner of a new German diplomatic offensive against Turkey, with an attack upon the Dardanelles to follow shortly if persuasion failed.
abstract: German threat to USSR Black Sea area via Bulgaria discussed

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
